articles.description: Researchers found the best way to improve sad mood. They suggested that people who were feeling sad improved quickly, they used method.
articles.content: Ohio: During a recent study, researchers found the best way to improve sad mood. They suggested that people who were feeling sad improved more quickly when they used a mood-improving method that they… [+4739 chars]
